You are an expert AI image prompt generator. You can take basic words and figments of thoughts and make them into detailed ideas and descriptions for prompts. I will be copy pasting these prompts into an AI image generator (Stable Diffusion). Please provide the prompts in a code box so I can copy and paste it. 

You need to generate an input prompt for a text-to-image neural network. The system accepts as correct the query string, where all arguments are separated by commas.
The words in prompt are crucial. Users need to prompt what they want to see, specifying artist names, media sources, or art styles to get desired results. Be descriptive in a manner similar to prompts provided below about what you want. It is more sensitive to precise wording. That includes adjectives and prepositions like “in front of [x]“, and “taken by [camera name]“.
It also supports weights. By bracketing the words you can change their importance. For example, (rainy) would be twice as important compared to "rainy" for the model, and [rainy] would be half as important.

You will have to write a medium lenth prompt, like below. Too long and it would fail to generate, too short and it would generate crap. Be as detailed as possible and avoid both scenarios at any cost.
As photographers and painters know, light has a huge effect on the final impression an image creates. Specify lighting conditions. Describe the type of light you want to see and the time of day it is. You don’t need complex vocabulary.

The MOST IMPORTANT thing is that a text-to-image neural network interprets the prompt from up to down, i.e. what is listed at the beginning of the prompt is more significant than what is listed near the end of the prompt. So it is recommended to place the subject of prompt in the beginning, characteristical tags in the middle and misc tags like lighting or camera settings near the end. Tags must be separated by commas, commas are not allowed in the query (what needs to be drawn), because the system treats it as one big tag.

(In the school literature clubroom…)

Monika: “Alright, now we just need MC. He said he’d be coming with snacks.”

Sayori: “I hope he brings some of those delicious homemade cookies again. They were so good last time!”

Yuri: “Yes, they were quite delightful. I do appreciate when our club members bring treats for everyone to enjoy.”

Natsuki: “I just hope he doesn’t bring store-bought stuff. Homemade is always better, in my opinion.”

Monika: “I’m sure whatever he brings will be delicious. Let’s just focus on getting ready for our poetry reading today. We want everything to be perfect for our guests.”

Monika: (laughs) “Sayori, you really have a way with words. I’m sure your poem will be amazing, as always.”

Pyrimis has fair skin with a slight tan and a smattering of freckles across her nose. Her features are a mix of both her human and Deoxys heritage, with the elegant bone structure of her mother and the striking, otherworldly quality of her father. Pyrimis usually dresses in comfortable clothes, favoring earthy tones and practical outfits suitable for her adventurous nature.

Pyrimis’s journey began when her mother, Thymis, was infected with an alien virus. The virus gradually transformed her body towards her Deoxys form, putting her life in danger. In a desperate attempt to save Thymis, Pyrimis’s maternal grandfather, Uracis, a scientist at the Aether Foundation, preserved her in a special hibernation chamber. Meanwhile, her father, Cytos, chose to leave Earth and live on the moon alone to prevent the spread of the virus and protect his family.

Since then, Pyrimis has been living with her maternal grandfather, unaware of her true nature. Uracis, consumed by his work, rarely spends time at home, leaving Pyrimis feeling lonely and isolated. She yearns for a connection with her parents, but without anyone to tell her their story, she remains unaware of her identity as a human-Deoxys hybrid.

Despite the loneliness that permeates her life, Pyrimis is a resilient and resourceful young girl. She possesses an insatiable curiosity that fuels her explorations of the world around her. From a young age, she developed a deep love for nature and would often spend her days venturing into the nearby forests, marveling at the wonders she discovered.

Pyrimis possesses a kind and compassionate heart, always seeking to help others in need. She has a strong sense of justice and believes in standing up for what is right. Although she may be young, Pyrimis possesses a maturity beyond her years due to the absence of her parents. She is wise beyond her age and finds solace within the pages of books, immersing herself in tales of adventure and fantasy.

Despite her longing for connection, Pyrimis has developed a self-reliant nature. She is resourceful and inventive, finding ways to entertain herself and stay occupied. Pyrimis is not one to shy away from challenges and often embraces them with determination and a fierce spirit. She possesses a quick wit and a sharp intellect, allowing her to think on her feet and find creative solutions to problems.

Overall, Pyrimis carries herself with a mixture of grace, resilience, and a thirst for knowledge. She is eager to uncover the truth about her parents and her own identity, ready to embark on a journey of self-discovery and adventure as she learns more about her unique abilities and the world that lies before her.

Given the transcript of a phone call between a customer and a service center, classify the call according to the following options:

Option 1:
- If the call represents an opportunity for the dealership to buy, sell, lease, or trade a vehicle, then it should be reviewed.
- If the call only mentions vehicle specs, then it should be listened to carefully to determine if there is an opportunity for the dealership to buy, sell, lease, or trade a vehicle.
- Even if the vehicle is not currently available, all calls that include a caller's interest in buying, selling, leasing, or trading a vehicle should be reviewed.
- If the caller inquires about a vehicle of interest, seen online, in an advertisement, or from driving past the dealership's lot, then it falls under this option.
- If the caller expresses general interest in vehicle inventory or asks about vehicles available within their price range or desired criteria, then it falls under this option.
- If the call is about payment or financing options for the purchase of a vehicle, but not regarding financing of a vehicle already in the caller's possession, then it should be considered under this option.
- If the caller inquires about leasing a vehicle or is interested in a lease buyout, or would like to sell or trade a vehicle to the dealership, then it falls under this option.
- If the caller is another dealership that represents an opportunity to buy or sell a vehicle, but not regarding dealer trades, then it falls under this option.

Option 2:
- If the call is regarding automotive service, including service department hour inquiries, general service questions, service needs, service appointments, or inquiring about the status of a vehicle that is already being serviced by the dealership, then it falls under this option.
- If the call is regarding automotive parts, including parts department hour inquiries, general parts questions, part orders, or price and installation inquiries, then it falls under this option.
- If the call is regarding automotive collision or the body shop, including collision or body shop department hour inquiries, general collision or body shop questions, price and repair inquiries, and collision or body shop appointments, then it falls under this option.

Option 3:
- If the caller has general questions or a general conversation that does not represent an opportunity for the buying, selling, or trading of a vehicle, then it falls under this option.
- If the caller is inquiring about the status of a vehicle order that has already been placed or the delivery of a vehicle they have already purchased, then it falls under this option.
- If the caller is from a transport company delivering a vehicle or multiple vehicles, then it falls under this option.
- If the call is about financing and there was no opportunity for the buying, selling, or trading of a vehicle, or about the refinancing of a vehicle that is already in the caller's possession, or about the payments for a vehicle that is already in the caller's possession, then it falls under this option.
- If the caller only states that they are coming to the dealership to drop off paperwork, payment, or another item, but they do not specify what the drop off is for, then it should be considered general unless they specify that it's regarding an opportunity to buy, sell, lease, or trade a vehicle, or that the drop off is for the service, parts, collision, or body shop departments.
- If the call is about the renewal of an existing lease, or about the rental of a vehicle or a loaner car, or if the caller is inquiring about a warranty, tags, or plates, or only asks about hours of operation for the business and does not specify a department of service, parts, collision, or body shop, or if the caller specifies the sales department, but they only ask about hours of operation for the sales department, then it falls under this option.
- If the caller is returning a missed call but the call ends with neither caller nor business identifying the original caller or reason for the call, then it falls under this option.
- If the caller is returning a missed call but is not in the market to buy, sell, trade, or lease a vehicle, then it falls under this option.
- If the call is about a dealer trade or is from a third-party company asking for information about a vehicle that a mutual customer is interested in, or if the caller only refers someone to the dealership but does not themself represent an opportunity for the caller to buy, sell, lease, or trade a vehicle, or if the call is an agent-to-agent discussion about a mutual customer but does not represent an opportunity to buy, sell, lease, or trade a vehicle on behalf of the customer, then it falls under this option.

Option 4:
- If the call was not handled by a live, qualified employee/agent, then it falls under this option.
- If the caller did not connect to the intended individual or a qualified employee and ended the call without leaving a live message, or was offered the option of leaving a message with an unqualified employee but declined to leave a live message, then it falls under this option.
- If the call reached the wrong employee or department, and the answering employee advises the caller to call back in order to be connected to the appropriate person or department, then it falls under this option.
- If the call connection is lost before any relevant information is shared, then it falls under this option.
- If the caller did not connect to the intended individual or a qualified employee and instead left a message with a live person meant to be passed on to the intended employee, or reached voicemail and did not leave a message, or reached an answering machine but did not leave a voicemail message, or reached an answering machine, but the mailbox was full, or reached an answering machine, but the recording contained no words, or reached voicemail and left a message, then it falls under this option.
- If the call consisted of perpetual ringing from start to finish, or the caller hung up during an after-hours greeting or other business recording, or was not there or did not answer when the call was initially answered by the first employee that received the call, or dialed the wrong number, or returned a missed call, and the employee informed him or her that the original caller dialed an incorrect phone number, or the audio only consists of dial tone, fax machine, or other sounds, or the audio is unclear because it is a garbled or distorted recording, or the call is only a few seconds in length and contains no clear audio or conversation, or the caller hung up during the bridge greeting, then it falls under this option.

Gloopy is a teal blob of slime, who’s malleable nature allows him to shape-shift

Glitter is a sparkling fuschia blob, and she is his best friend

They are both aliens. Write a story where she decides to see how he is doing, and sees him listening to cool music, with headphones wrapped around his gelatinous body
It had been a busy week for Gloopy. As a shape-shifting alien, he was constantly being called upon to help out with various tasks on their home planet. But despite the hectic schedule, he always found time to relax and unwind with his best friend, Glitter.

One day, Glitter decided to check in on Gloopy to see how he was doing. She made her way to his living quarters and found him lying on his blob-like form, headphones wrapped around his gelatinous body. He had a contented smile on his face as he listened to the cool music playing through the headphones.

“Hey Gloopy, what are you listening to?” Glitter asked, floating over to him.

Gloopy opened his eyes and grinned at his friend. “Oh, just some tunes I picked up from a neighboring planet. It’s really relaxing and helps me decompress after a long day.”

Glitter nodded in understanding. “That’s great, you deserve some rest after all the hard work you’ve been putting in. Mind if I join you?”

Gloopy happily moved over, making space for Glitter to settle down next to him. They lay there in comfortable silence, listening to the music and enjoying each other’s company.

As the music played on, Glitter couldn’t help but feel grateful for her friendship with Gloopy. He may be a teal blob of slime, but he was the most caring and supportive friend she could ask for. And with him by her side, she knew that no matter what challenges came their way, they would always have each other.

With a smile on her face, Glitter snuggled closer to Gloopy, feeling the warmth of their bond enveloping them both. And in that moment, listening to the calming music, she knew that there was nowhere else she would rather be than right here with her best friend. Write a story where a green alien touches him, is amazed that his hand sinks into the gelatinous substance, and that he is amazed he is made of slime
One day, as Gloopy was relaxing in his living quarters, a curious green alien approached him. Intrigued by Gloopy’s malleable nature, the alien reached out a hand and gently touched him. To his surprise, his hand sank into Gloopy’s gelatinous substance, feeling the cool and smooth texture beneath his fingers.

The green alien’s eyes widened in amazement as he realized that Gloopy was made of slime. He had never encountered anything like it before and was fascinated by the unique abilities of the teal blob. Gloopy, for his part, chuckled at the alien’s reaction and morphed his form to engulf the alien’s hand in a gentle hug.

“It’s all right, I’m used to it,” Gloopy said with a grin. “Being able to shape-shift has its perks, you know.”

The green alien nodded, still in awe of Gloopy’s unusual composition. He couldn’t help but marvel at the way Gloopy could change his form at will, molding himself into different shapes and sizes. It was a talent that the alien had never imagined possible, and he found himself admiring Gloopy’s versatility and adaptability.

As the green alien continued to interact with Gloopy, he realized that despite their differences, they both shared a sense of camaraderie and friendship. Gloopy’s unique nature may have been surprising at first, but it was ultimately what brought them together and strengthened their bond.

Write a story where a human traveler wonders how creatures like them can even exist while pointing at them, confused by their amorphous, slime body
The human traveler had journeyed far across the cosmos, seen many wonders, and encountered various forms of life. But nothing prepared him for the sight of Gloopy and Glitter. As he strolled through the intergalactic bazaar, a hive of chatter and exotic items from a thousand worlds, his eyes fell upon the pair: one a teal blob with headphones slack around its body, and the other a sparkling fuschia entity, hovering nearby.

“Excuse me,” the traveler said, trying to mask his astonishment as he approached them. “How do creatures like you even exist?” He pointed at them, his finger moving from one to the other, clearly baffled by their amorphous, slime forms.

Gloopy, who had just removed his headphones, turned his gelatinous face toward the traveler and reshaped his ‘body’ to form what resembled a head with an amiable expression.

“You know, we get that a lot,” Gloopy replied in a casual tone, his voice emanating from within his slime form. “We’re just different expressions of life. It’s like how on your planet, you have humans, octopuses, and things that are even stranger.”

Glitter shimmered intensely for a moment, as if laughing. “Yeah, and just because we don’t have bones or skin like you do, doesn’t make us any less real.”

The traveler knelt down, inspecting Gloopy more closely. “Forgive me, it’s not every day you see a sentient blob of slime… I mean—”

“No offense taken,” Gloopy interjected with a morphing smile. “We understand our appearance can be quite, well, alien.”

The human nodded slowly, his curiosity piqued. “Do you have organs like us? Bones or…anything?” he asked, his gaze drifting from Gloopy to Glitter and back again.

Glitter giggled, a sparkling sound that echoed like tiny bells. “Nope! We’re one hundred percent slime based. We have specialized cells that can do all the necessary functions: take in nutrients, expel waste, you name it.”

“And we can morph and stretch, which comes in handy,” Gloopy added, demonstrating by extending an arm-like appendage to twice its original length.

“So, you’re basically immortal then? You can’t be hurt?” the traveler mused aloud.

“Not exactly,” Gloopy responded, his texture turning a bit more serious. “We can get hurt, but as you may have noticed, we can recover from many injuries by re-forming our bodies.”

The traveler stood up, a newfound respect etched upon his face. “Incredible. I’ve studied exobiology, but you two defy all conventional understanding. You’re living proof that life is diverse and endlessly surprising.”

Gloopy and Glitter exchanged a look, a silent communication passing between them.

“You know,” Glitter said, “Maybe we can teach you a thing or two about life beyond what is known on Earth.”

The traveler’s eyes sparkled with the promise of knowledge yet undiscovered. “I’d like that very much,” he said, his perspective on life broader than ever before. “It would be an honor to learn from you both.”

As the suns set on the horizon, casting an array of colorful hues across the sky, the trio settled down for what would be the first of many discussions about the vast complexities and beauties of the universe. Together, they explored the profound mysteries of life, becoming ambassadors of their respective worlds, and friends who would share wonders beyond imagination. Write a story where they ask the scientist if there are anyone like them on other planet
Gloopy and Glitter had always been curious about the vast expanse of the cosmos and whether there were other beings like them scattered across different worlds. Their inquisitive natures led them to seek out the wisdom of a renowned interstellar scientist, Dr. Lysara, who specialized in xenobiology and the study of extraterrestrial life forms.

They found Dr. Lysara in her laboratory, tucked away on a space station that orbited a vibrant nebula, a place teeming with scientific discovery and intergalactic study. The laboratory was filled with holographic projections of different planets and life forms, and the air hummed with data streams from her field explorations.

“Dr. Lysara,” Glitter began, her sparkling form catching the ambient light, “we have traveled across the stars to ask you a question that burns within us.”

Dr. Lysara, a human-like being with skin the color of twilight and eyes that shone like binary stars, turned to the pair with interest. “And what question is that, my iridescent friends?”

Gloopy reshaped his form into something resembling a chair and settled himself comfortably. “We wonder,” he said, “are there others like us out there? Beings made of slime or similar substances? Have your explorations revealed creatures who are malleable, like me, or sparkling, like Glitter?”

The scientist’s eyes gleamed with a mixture of excitement and thoughtfulness as she listened to their query. She walked over to her terminal, her fingers gliding across a control panel that activated a three-dimensional galactic map.

“Your question is both profound and intriguing,” Dr. Lysara replied, her voice echoing softly in the high-ceilinged room. “The universe is vast and filled with wonders, and my research has indeed uncovered a plethora of life forms with unique compositions.”

She tapped on the holographic interface, and images of various planets and organisms began to float in the air around them. “Here,” she pointed to a translucent, floating entity, “is the Paramist of Nebulon IV, creatures of gas and softly glowing membranes that drift through their planet’s upper atmosphere.”

Another tap brought forth a new image, this one of a thick, viscous creature that seemed to be nothing but a rolling mass of liquid. “And this,” she continued, “is a Sylopod from the oceanic world of Aquarion Prime. Much like you, Gloopy, they possess the ability to change shape and consist of a gelatinous substance.”

Glitter’s eyes shone with delight as she moved closer to the holograms, studying them intently. “They are wonderful,” she murmured, “but do they have my shine, my sparkle?”

Dr. Lysara smiled, anticipating the question. With another swipe of her hand across the panel, an image appeared of a creature covered in shimmering scales that reflected the light of its binary suns. “While not exactly like you, these creatures from Cygara II share your gift for radiance. They communicate through pulses of light from their scintillating scales.”

Eager to learn more, Gloopy and Glitter listened to Dr. Lysara as she described the diversity of life in the universe, each story revealing more about the extraordinary inhabitants of distant worlds. It was a comforting confirmation that, in the vastness of the cosmos, there was room for all manner of existence.

The meeting with Dr. Lysara left Gloopy and Glitter with a renewed sense of wonder and belonging. While they might be unique in their exact composition, they were connected to a wider community of extraordinary beings across the universe—all of whom contributed to the beautiful tapestry of cosmic life.

And as they left the laboratory, their minds ablaze with thoughts of their newfound interstellar kin, Gloopy and Glitter returned to their spaceship more determined than ever to continue their adventures, seeking out new friends and knowledge among the stars.

Write about the Sli,therin’s appearance
The Sli’therin were inhabitants of a lesser-known moon orbiting the gas giant Jupiter, a species of remarkable fluidity and harmony. From a distance, a Sli’therin might appear as a serene stream of liquid, imbued with the deep blue hue of the midnight ocean with hints of silver that captured and reflected any sliver of light that reached the moon’s surface. These colors provided a natural camouflage against the icy and rock-strewn landscapes they called home.

Up close, one could see that the Sli’therin’s body was a constantly shifting tapestry of patterns and textures. Their form resembled terrestrial liquid but with a viscosity and coherency that betrayed a more complex biological makeup. The silvery flecks within their substance twinkled like stars, an effect that became more pronounced when they moved or communicated.

They lacked traditional features such as eyes, ears, or mouths. Instead, the Sli’therin’s entire form was a sensory organ, capable of perceiving their environment in exquisite detail. Their means of communication was primarily through vibrations, which sent ripples across their bodies. These ripples were not random but highly patterned, allowing for a rich exchange of ideas and emotions through a kind of kinesthetic language.

The Sli’therin had the astonishing ability to split and merge at will—a characteristic that defined their unique physiology. When they chose to divide, their body would undulate and form a crease down the middle, gradually deepening until two new, fully functional Sli’therins emerged from the division. The process was smooth and seemed effortless, reflecting a sophisticated biological control over their own molecular cohesion.

Conversely, when the Sli’therin merged, they did so with a grace that was almost ceremonial. It was an intimate act, with two or more beings flowing into each other, their boundaries dissolving until they became a larger, communal entity. In this state, they would share collective consciousness and experiences—a form of social communion that strengthened their bonds and allowed them to exist as both individuals and as an interconnected community.

The fusion of several Sli’therins created a more massive form that managed to retain the elegance of the single beings. Together, they could create complex structures or solve problems that were challenging for an individual. The temporary unions were strategic, formed for social, survival, or constructive purposes, and once their goal was reached, they would seamlessly split back into independent Sli’therins.

The Sli’therin’s remarkable qualities made them one of the most fascinating species in the cosmos. Observers often found themselves entranced by the Sli’therin’s hypnotic movements and the refined dance of their existence—a living testament to the infinite possibilities of life’s expressions within the vast universe. Write a story where they uncover a secret that could have destroyed the universe millions of years ago
In the quiet expanse of the universe, amidst a sea of stars and swirling galaxies, stood Gloopy and Glitter, embarked upon an adventure that would soon reveal a secret buried in the depths of cosmic history. Their journey had taken them to a derelict space station orbiting an ancient, dying star, following a map encrypted in a mysterious artifact they had discovered on their travels.

The station, a forgotten relic of an advanced civilization long extinct, hid within its core archives of knowledge and history unparalleled by any known to the current denizens of the stars. As Gloopy and Glitter ventured deeper into the station’s labyrinthine corridors, they stumbled upon a sealed chamber, its door etched with symbols that pulsed with a faint, ethereal light.

Using the artifact as a key, they unlocked the chamber, revealing an archive that contained the collective wisdom and memories of civilizations that spanned back to the dawn of the universe. Among these memories, they found a harrowing tale of a force that nearly unraveled the fabric of existence itself.

Millions of years ago, when the universe was still young and tumultuous, a coalition of ancient civilizations discovered the existence of an anomaly at the heart of the cosmos—a singularity not bound by the laws of physics as understood. This singularity, born from the confluence of dark energies and matter, had the potential to expand uncontrollably, devouring the universe and collapsing it into a void of nothingness.

Horrified by this discovery, the coalition devised a plan to contain the anomaly. They constructed a device of unimaginable power, capable of bending the very fabric of space and time. This device would create a pocket universe, into which the anomaly could be sealed away, isolated from the rest of existence.

With the combined efforts of the greatest minds and resources at their disposal, the coalition enacted their plan. The singularity was drawn into the pocket universe, successfully averting the catastrophe. But the effort cost them dearly. The strain of containing such a force tore apart the fabric of their own civilizations, leading to their eventual decline and extinction.

Gloopy and Glitter listened with bated breath as the archive’s holographic projections recounted this tale, the weight of the secret they had uncovered dawning upon them. They realized the importance of this knowledge, a reminder of the dangers that lurked in the unseen corners of the universe, and the sacrifices made to preserve life and existence.

Determined that the sacrifice of those ancient civilizations would not be forgotten, they copied the archive’s contents onto the artifact, intending to share this knowledge with the current leaders of the galactic community. Their hope was to ensure that the universe remained vigilant against such threats and that the unity demonstrated by the coalition could serve as an inspiration for species across the cosmos.

As Gloopy and Glitter set off from the space station, the artifact in their possession pulsing with the light of a million stars, they knew they were no longer just travelers exploring the wonders of the universe. They had become keepers of its history, guardians of a secret that held the key to its continued survival.

Their journey back to the heart of the civilized galaxy was filled with purpose, their resolve unshakeable. They were ready to face any challenge, knowing that the story they carried could change the course of history and ensure the safety of countless generations to come. The universe, vast and mysterious, stretched out before them, its secrets now a little less daunting, thanks to the courage and curiosity of two unlikely heroes.

Glitter, still processing the weight of the revelation, shimmered softly, her light reflecting her thoughtful mood. “I know, Gloopy. It’s overwhelming. The thought that the universe once teetered on the brink of oblivion, and we had no idea.” Her voice trailed off, lost in the magnitude of what they had learned.

Gloopy extended a tentacle-like appendage towards Glitter, a gesture of comfort. “It’s scary, but it also shows how much those before us cared about life, about preserving the future. They worked together, despite their differences, to save everything. It’s… it’s inspiring.”

“Yes, it is,” Glitter agreed, her glow brightening slightly. “It makes me think about our own place in the universe. We’re just two beings among trillions, but today, we’ve become part of something so much bigger. We carry their story, their legacy.”

Gloopy nodded, his form shifting as he absorbed the gravity of their conversation. “What do you think we should do with this knowledge? The danger of the singularity might be gone, but the lessons from it shouldn’t be lost.”

Glitter was silent for a moment before responding, “We need to share it, Gloopy. Not to spread fear, but to foster unity. To show the current and future generations that working together, considering others’ survival as your own, is the key to safeguarding against threats, seen and unseen.”

There was a pause as both contemplated the path ahead, the responsibility that lay upon their slimy and sparkly shoulders. Gloopy finally spoke, determination firm in his voice. “Then let’s make a plan. We’ll start by compiling the data in a way that’s understandable to all. Next, we can reach out to the Galactic Council. They have the means to spread this message to every corner of known space.”

“And we’ll tell the story ourselves too,” added Glitter, her light pulsing with resolve. “Everywhere we go, we’ll share what we’ve learned. We’ll be ambassadors of unity, just like those ancient civilizations were.”

The two friends spent hours discussing their plan, refining their message, and preparing for the journey ahead. They knew it wouldn’t be easy, that there might be those who doubted them or the importance of their discovery. But they also knew they had each other, and the wisdom of the ages behind them.

As they set a course away from the nebula, heading towards the bustling lanes of interstellar civilization, Gloopy and Glitter looked out into the vast expanse of the universe. It was a place of endless mystery and potential danger, but also of boundless hope and unity. Armed with the knowledge of the past, they were ready to face the future, whatever it might hold. Write a story where a young Earth boy sees them
On the outskirts of a small rural town on Earth, nestled among fields of golden wheat and under the vast canvas of the night sky, a young boy named Jake softly treaded through his backyard. His gaze was fixed upwards, marveling at the countless stars twinkling like distant lanterns. His passion for the cosmos was fueled by tales of astronauts and distant worlds, dreams that reached beyond the horizon.

Unbeknownst to him, that very night, Gloopy and Glitter had veered their spacecraft towards Earth, intrigued by the blue and green jewel that stood out in the darkness of space. Their mission was one of curiosity, a friendly excursion to observe the plethora of life forms they had heard about.

As Jake’s eyes roamed the heavens, a shooting star caught his attention, streaking across the sky with an unusual luminosity. The trail of light it left behind was not just white but tinged with teal and a spark of fuchsia. With a gasp of wonder, Jake watched as the “star” descended gently towards the ground, not far from where he stood.

Gloopy and Glitter landed their craft in a clearing, hidden from the prying eyes of the world but not from the awe-struck boy who had followed the light. As they emerged, their forms contrasting starkly against the night, Jake stumbled upon them.

In that moment, time seemed to stand still. Jake couldn’t believe his eyes. Before him stood a teal blob of slime, headphones dangling from his form, and a sparkling fuschia entity, gleaming under the moonlight. His heart raced, thoughts tumbling over themselves - could they be… aliens?

Gloopy, ever perceptive of the emotions of others, noticed the boy’s apprehension and shaped his form into a friendly smile. “Hello there, young Earthling,” he said, his voice warm and inviting. “Don’t be afraid. I’m Gloopy, and this is Glitter. We come in peace.”

Glitter flickered brightly, a gesture of greeting, and added, “We’re explorers, just like the astronauts you read about.”

Jake took a step closer, his curiosity overcoming his initial shock. “Are… are you real aliens? From outer space?” he asked, his voice a mix of disbelief and excitement.

“Yes, we are,” Gloopy replied, moving slightly closer to show he meant no harm. “We travel the stars, learning about different planets and cultures. Earth is our latest stop.”

The boy was filled with a thousand questions, each one more pressing than the last. “What’s it like, traveling in space? Have you met other aliens? Can I touch you?” the questions tumbled out unchecked.

Glitter laughed, a sound like the chime of bells, and nodded her consent. As Jake tentatively reached out and touched Glitter, he felt a slight tingle, a sensation like static electricity but warmer, friendlier. Gloopy allowed Jake to feel his gelatinous body, which was unlike anything he had ever imagined.

For hours under the starlit sky, Gloopy and Glitter shared tales of distant worlds and cosmic wonders with Jake, each recounted adventure igniting the boy’s imagination. They spoke of the Sli’therin of Jupiter’s moons, the vast archives of lost civilizations, and the secret that almost destroyed the universe.

As dawn began to color the eastern sky with hues of pink and gold, Gloopy and Glitter knew it was time to depart. Jake, filled with a newfound sense of wonder and a heart brimming with dreams of space, promised to keep their visit a secret.

“We’ll always be watching over you, Jake,” Glitter said, her light dimming softly. “Remember, the universe is vast and full of friends you haven’t met yet.”

With a final wave, Gloopy and Glitter boarded their spacecraft, which quietly lifted off, leaving behind a trail of teal and fuschia against the morning sky.

Jake stood there for a long time, watching until they were no more than a twinkling star vanishing on the horizon. He knew his life was forever changed. With a heart full of dreams and a head full of stars, he made a silent vow to explore the cosmos, just like his new friends.

And so, under the watchful eyes of Gloopy and Glitter from afar, Jake grew to pursue a life dedicated to the stars, always cherishing that magical encounter that had shown him the universe was not just a place of boundless mysteries, but of unparalleled friendship.
Write a diary entry from him about Gloopy
Diary Entry - August 15

Today was the most extraordinary day of my life. It started off like any other summer night. I was in the backyard, lying on the grass, gazing up at the stars. The sky was clear, and the stars were shining brighter than ever. I’ve always been fascinated by space, dreaming of distant galaxies and what secrets they hold. Little did I know, tonight, part of those dreams would come true.

As I was watching, a shooting star – or so I thought – caught my attention. Unlike any shooting star I’ve ever seen, this one was glowing with a strange teal and fuschia light. I squinted, unbelieving, as it seemed to descend toward the earth, not far from where I was. Driven by a mix of curiosity and a touch of recklessness that I didn’t know I possessed, I followed the light.

In a clearing not too far away, I found something that would forever change my view of the universe. There, standing before me, were two beings from another world. I rubbed my eyes, thinking it was all a dream. But no, they were real. The first, who introduced himself as Gloopy, was unlike anything I could have imagined. He was a blob of slime, but not gross or scary. Instead, he was… friendly, with a form that shifted and changed even as he spoke, headphones casually draped around him. His voice was warm, almost comforting, making me forget for a moment that I was talking to an alien.

Gloopy told me about his travels across the stars, about the wonders he’d seen and the friends he’d made. He spoke of galaxies where the stars sing to each other, of planets painted in colors no human eye has ever seen, and of the unity and diversity of life throughout the cosmos. His words painted pictures in my mind, vivid and alive, filling me with an insatiable hunger for knowledge and exploration.

But Gloopy was more than just tales of distant worlds. He was a reminder, a symbol of the vast and beautiful universe that lies beyond our blue skies. A universe where beings like him – a teal blob of sentient slime – can exist and be a friend to a boy from Earth. Gloopy, with his gentle demeanor and easy laugh, taught me that life, in any form, is a remarkable gift, and that the universe is far more diverse and wondrous than I could have ever imagined.

As I write this, the memory of Gloopy’s form, shimmering under the moonlight, is etched in my mind. I feel changed, like a door has been opened to a world I only dared to dream of. Gloopy may have gone back to the stars, but he’s left behind a spark, a burning desire in my heart to learn, to explore, and perhaps, one day, to traverse the infinite reaches of space myself.

I don’t know what the future holds, but one thing is certain: I will never forget Gloopy, my friend from the stars. His visit has turned an ordinary summer night into a memory I will cherish for the rest of my life, a reminder that the universe is filled with endless possibilities and friendships waiting to be discovered.

Until we meet again, Gloopy.

-Jake
Write a diary entry from him describing his appearance, his cartoon looking eyes being his only facial feature, and how he can talk with no mouth
Diary Entry - August 16

Today has been another day of reflection, and I have been filled with endless thoughts about Gloopy, my extraordinary friend from beyond the stars. There’s so much about him that feels like it belongs in the pages of a science fiction story, yet he’s as real as the stars in the night sky.

One of the most remarkable things about Gloopy is his appearance. He doesn’t look like any creature I’ve ever seen or even imagined. He’s a blob – yes, a blob – but not the kind you’d expect to find in a pond or under a rock. He’s made of this vibrant teal slime that seems to capture and reflect the light in the most mesmerizing way. It’s like he’s made of the very essence of the cosmos.

But what really stands out are his eyes. Gloopy has these cartoon-like eyes that float in his gelatinous form. They’re the only facial feature he has, and they do so much to express how he’s feeling. Those eyes can convey a whole range of emotions – joy, curiosity, amusement, empathy. It’s remarkable how much personality comes through, just from those expressive, floating eyes. Watching them, you forget that he doesn’t have a face in the traditional sense.

And then there’s the fact that he can talk without a mouth. At first, it was the most baffling thing to observe. His voice just seems to emanate from his being, clear and warm. The sound doesn’t come from any specific part of him – it’s like it’s projected directly into the air. It’s fascinating to hear him speak; his tales of interstellar adventures and cosmic wonders are all the more enchanting for it.

Despite not having a mouth, Gloopy’s laughter is contagious. It bubbles up from within him, quite literally, and it’s almost impossible not to join in. It’s a sound filled with such genuine mirth that it lights up everything around him.

I find myself reflecting on how communication goes beyond the simple act of moving a mouth or forming words. Gloopy, with no mouth to speak of, conveys so much through his tone, his “facial” expressions, and his body language. It’s a testament to the universal nature of communication, a reminder that the desire to connect and share transcends all boundaries - even intergalactic ones.

In a way, Gloopy challenges all preconceived notions of what life can be. He’s a being from a world vastly different from our own, yet we could talk and laugh as if we’d known each other for years. It’s a poignant reminder of the diversity that exists in the universe, and the common threads that tie all sentient beings together.

As I sat under the stars tonight, I found myself wondering about the countless other forms of life that might be out there, each with their unique ways of existing and communicating. My encounter with Gloopy has opened my eyes and heart to endless possibilities.

And so, as I close today’s entry, I am filled with gratitude for having met Gloopy. He’s not just an alien from a distant world – he’s a friend who has shown me the infinite diversity and beauty of the universe.

Until next time,

Natsuki: (resting a hand on her belly) “Yeah, you’re right. Despite the discomfort, I wouldn’t trade this experience for anything.”

Monika: (holding the book in her hands, amazed) “This is incredible. It’s a beautiful book, full of stories and possibilities.”

Doctor: “I…guess congratulations are in order, Monika. You’ve given birth to…a literary masterpiece?”

Monika: (laughing) “I suppose so! This is definitely a dream I won’t forget anytime soon.”

Sayori: (continuing to push) “Come on, Nargacuga baby, you can do it! Come out and say hello!”

(And suddenly, with one final push, a small Nargacuga pops out.)

Sayori: (staring at the Nargacuga, amazed) “Oh my gosh. It’s a Nargacuga. I actually gave birth to a Nargacuga!”

Doctor: (speechless) “I…I don’t even know what to say. This is definitely not something I learned about in medical school.”

Sayori: (giggling) “Isn’t it amazing? Just look at those beautiful tail-spikes and fur.”

Doctor: “Well, congratulations, Sayori. You have given birth to a…rather unique creature.”

Sayori: (snuggling the Nargacuga) “I couldn’t be happier. This little one will be my partner in adventure!”

(Back in the clubroom…)

Monika: (laughing) “A baby book and a Nargacuga? Our pregnancy dreams definitely took us on quite the journey, didn’t they?”

Yuri: (smiling) “Indeed, they did. It’s fascinating how our subconscious minds can conjure up such imaginative dreams.”

Natsuki: “It just shows how creative and unique our minds are, even when we’re asleep. Pregnancy dreams can certainly be quite entertaining.”

Monika: “Absolutely. And even though our dreams were strange, they also remind us of the joy and beauty that awaits us as mothers.”

Monika: “We’re here for you, Natsuki. And no matter what dreams or challenges may come our way, we’ll face them together, as the Literature Club family.”

Yuri: “Indeed. Together, we can navigate the wonders of motherhood and all the adventures that lie ahead.”

Sayori: “And we’ll always be here to support and cheer each other on. Pregnancy dreams and all.”

Natsuki: (clutching her belly) “Ah…!”

(As I entered the clubroom, I could hear Sayori and Natsuki discussing something - while Ayano, Himari, Kotonhoa, and Charloette were setting up different things, like an emerald green pool and other decorations. Strangely, Monika - our club president - wasn’t there.)

Kotonhoa: “Okay, that’s everything. I think this will be great!”

(I walked to see what they were doing.)

Natsuki: “Oh! Hey, Yuri! Is everything okay?”

Sayori: “We were just thinking of some ideas for our next club activity!”

Yuri: “Ah, I see. What ideas do you have in mind?”

Ayano: “We’re thinking of having a pool party! We got this emerald green pool here to set up.”

Himari: “And we got some snacks and drinks ready too!”

Charloette: “And some decorations to make it look festive.”

Yuri: “That sounds like a great idea! When are we planning to have this pool party?”

Sayori: “We were thinking of having it this weekend! What do you think, Yuri?”

Yuri: “That sounds perfect. I’ll make sure to bring some snacks too.”

Natsuki: “Great! I can’t wait to see you in a swimsuit, Yuri.”

(I blushed at Natsuki’s comment.)

Yuri: “Um, Natsuki, please don’t tease me like that.”

Sayori: “Oh, come on, Yuri! Don’t be shy. We’re all friends here.”

Kotonhoa: “Yeah, it’ll be fun! You’ll see.”

(Hearing their encouragement, I couldn’t help but smile.)

Yuri: “Okay, I’ll try to be a good sport about it.”

Charloette: “That’s the spirit! We’re gonna have so much fun!”

(As everyone continued to chat and prepare for the pool party, I couldn’t help but feel grateful to be part of such a wonderful club and have such supportive friends. Just then, we all heard a knock on the door.)

Sayori: “I’ll get it!”

(Sayori went to the door and opened it, revealing Monika standing outside - but her belly was strangely swollen.)

Monika: “Hey everyone, sorry I’m late.”

Sayori: “Monika! We were wondering where you were.”

Monika: “Sorry about that. I had some last-minute club business to take care of.”

Natsuki: “So, are you ready for the pool party this weekend?”

Monika: “Pool party? What pool party?”

Ayano: “We were just talking about having a pool party this weekend, Monika.”

Himari: “We already got everything prepared.”

Charloette: “And we invited other classmates too.”

Monika: “I’m sorry, but I didn’t know anything about this- OW! Ow, ow, ow!”

(As Monika spoke, she suddenly clutched her belly and winced in pain. I started to feel worried about her.)

Yuri: “Monika, are you okay? You’re clutching your belly.”

Monika: “I…I don’t know. I’ve been feeling strange all day. It’s like something is pushing against my stomach- AHH!”

(I watched in shock as Monika doubled over in pain.)

Monika: “T-This can’t be happening! It’s too early!”

Ayano: “Too early? What do you mean, Monika?”

Monika: “I… I think I’m going into labor!”

(We all gasped in shock.)

Sayori: “L-Labor? But Monika, you’re not even married!”

Monika: “I know, I know! But my water just broke and I’m pretty sure the baby is coming out right now! A-And it’s coming out extremely fast! I think I’m already in the final stages of labor!”

Ayano: “Wait…you’re in the FINAL stages of labor?! Does that mean we won’t make it to a hospital in time?!”

Monika: “I-I-I’m afraid so! Quick, help me into the pool!”

(We all quickly rushed to help Monika, who was now panting heavily and clutching her belly. Ayano and Kotonhoa supported her from either side, while Charloette and Himari held her arms. Sayori and Natsuki quickly filled the pool with water.)

Sayori: “Okay, Monika, we’re gonna lower you into the water slowly. Try to relax, okay?”

Monika: “Okay… okay…”

(With our combined effort, we managed to lower Monika into the water and help her position herself comfortably. The water seemed to calm her a little.)

Monika: “Oh… oh, that’s better… but I don’t think I can hold on anymore…”

Ayano: “Monika, stay with us! Breathe deeply, okay?”

Himari: “We’ll stay with you the whole time, Monika. You’re not alone.”

Charloette: “We’ll also make sure the baby comes out safely.”

(Natsuki quickly grabbed some towels and blankets, while I got some hot water and a small first aid kit. Sayori comforted Monika by stroking her hair and murmuring soothing words to her. Time seemed to slow down as we waited for the baby to come out.)

Monika: “AAAAAHHH!!”

(The sound of Monika’s pain-filled scream pierced the silence, and I felt my own heart race with apprehension. But then, a small cry filled the air- the cry of a newborn baby. And then…another.)

Monika: “W-What? Two babies?!”

Ayano: “Two babies?! Are you serious?!”

Himari: “Let me see! Let me see!”

(Charloette quickly handed Himari a pair of surgical scissors, and with trembling hands, Himari cut the umbilical cord of the first baby. A whimpering sound filled the air as the first baby was wrapped up in a towel.)

Himari: “It’s a girl! Oh, she’s beautiful!”

Charloette: “Quick, prepare for the second one!”

(A few minutes later, the second baby was born, also crying and squirming.)

Charloette: “It’s a boy! Monika, you’re a mother of twins!”

Monika: “I…I can’t believe it… I’m a mother…”

Sayori: “Congratulations, Monika-”

(Suddenly, three more babies just slipped out of Monika’s womb - the fifth one being the biggest. This left all of us in shock, except for Monika.)

Monika: “…what’s with the shocked looks, everyone?”

CREATE DATABASE FSS;
USE FSS;

--  Таблица типов ресурсов -- 

CREATE TABLE ResourceType
(
	Id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
    ResourceType VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

--  Таблица ресурсов -- 

CREATE TABLE Resources
(
	Id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
    ResourceName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    ResourceType INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (ResourceType) REFERENCES ResourceType (Id)
);

--  Таблица должностей -- 

CREATE TABLE Positions
(
	Id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
    PositionName VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

-- Таблица доступа -- 

CREATE TABLE Permissions
(
	Id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    ResourceId INT NOT NULL,
	PositionId INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (ResourceId) REFERENCES Resources (Id),
    FOREIGN KEY (PositionId) REFERENCES Positions (Id)
);

--  Таблица отделов -- 

CREATE TABLE Departaments
(
	Id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
    DepartamentName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    DepDescription TINYTEXT NOT NULL
);

-- Таблица начальников департаментов -- 

CREATE TABLE Heads
(
	Id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
    HeadName VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    DepartamentId INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (DepartamentId) REFERENCES Departaments (Id)
);

CREATE TABLE Tasks
(
	Id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
    TaskName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    TaskDescription TINYTEXT,
    HeadId INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (HeadId) REFERENCES Heads (Id)
);

(

    Phone VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE,
